articles.title: North Carolina prosecutors seize $61 million in USDT tied to 'pig butchering' scam | The Block
articles.description: The funds were traced to crypto wallets allegedly used to launder money stolen from victims lured online to fake trading platforms.

articles.title: The Bitcoin Inheritance Dilemma: What Will You Leave Behind? | What Is Bitcoin?
articles.description: Bitcoin is just another asset to be managed within the framework of the state. But they also inherit your exposure. Their wealth is known. Tracked. Subject to future wealth taxes, confiscation schemes, or political targeting. The coins that bought your house, funded your retirement, secured your family’s future—now they’re a liability on a government ledger somewhere. You pass your “tainted” coins. No lawyers...
